summary: This mod add a lovely but ruthless (when she have to) warrior follower specialized in two-handed combat. Partially based on my own character, she is also standalone. 7B / UNP / UNPB Body
descriptionHtml:
[font=Georgia][color=#a2c4c9][b][size=5][center][img]http://i.imgur.com/T5gR2Bk.png[/img][/center]Introduction[/size][/b][/color][/font]

Hello everyone !

So firstly english is not my native langage and can be a little bad, im sorry for that. Also, its my first mod ever so.. Please be geeeentle with me Senpai (≧‿≦)

Brynhild is a standalone follower that mean you dont need anything else to make her face and body like in my screenshots. I highly recommend Facelight because.. well, it's an awesome mod and i used it for almost all my images.

Brynhild is specialized in two-handed combat, wearing mainly heavy armor, she also have few archery's, blocks perk's (but not too much) just for
convenience. You will find her in The Drunken Huntsman (Whiterun).
She start only with a Steel Armor, a bow, some arrows, a banded iron shield, a steel sword and an Iron Battleaxe. Nothing fancy.

[center]

[font=Georgia][size=6]
[color=#ffe599][b]Big Thanks to [/b][/color][/size][/font][font=Georgia][size=6][color=#ffe599][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1054929]Supertin[/url] ![/b][/color][/size][/font]

[youtube]ekL2LcW8cuU[/youtube]

[b][font=Georgia][size=4]
Don't forget to check his [/size][/font][font=Georgia][size=4][url=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCuOyXRkpN_S1Hyyt3kyRG7g]youtube channel[/url][/size][/font] [/b]:)


[/center]
[b][font=Georgia][size=5][color=#a2c4c9]Character [/color][/size][/font][/b]

Little she's been found all alone by some hunters in the wild of Falkreath region. Her origin are still mysterious, however, she is an elf but was adopted and raised by Nords, her adoptive father who was a blacksmith taught her how to use a blade and quickly saw her potential. She always wanted to be an adventurer. Now she is a young mercenary who travel all around Skyrim. She is very strong and ruthless despite appearances.

[u][b]
Basic Info[/b][/u]

Name : Brynhild

Level : Lvl up with player

Marriageable : Yes

Body : SeveNBase / UNP / UNPB ( Height 1.00 - Weight 100 )

Location : Whiterun, The Drunken Huntsman

Default Outfit : 

- Steel Armor

- Iron Battleaxe

[size=4][b]Perks[/b][/size] :

[u][b][i]Two-Handed[/i][/b][/u]

- Barbarian
- Champion Stance
- Deep Wounds
- Limbsplitter
- Skullcrusher
- Great Critical Charge
- Sweep
- Devastating Blow
- Warmaster

[u][b][i]Block[/i][/b][/u]

- Shield Wall

[u][b][i]Archery[/i][/b][/u]

- Critical Shot
- Overdraw

[u][i]Sneak[/i][/u]

- Light Foot

[b][font=Georgia][color=#cc4125]
[color=#a61c00][size=5]For People with hairs issues[/size][/color][/color][/font]

[/b][color=#cc0000][size=4]
[/size][/color][b][color=#a61c00][size=4][i][b]If you have the 1.1 version[/b][/i][/size][/color][u][i][b]

[/b][/i][/u]Basically you just have to overwrite the .nif from : skyrim\Data\meshes\actors\character\facegendata\facegeom\Brynhild.esp.

If you know what you're doing and dont want to DL again all the files i added a link under Miscellaneous Tab.[/b]
[b]If you're not at ease with skyrim folders just install the new files with a mod installer.
[color=#cc4125][i]
[color=#a61c00][size=4]Below 1.1[/size][/color][/i][/color]

Install the new files
 
 
Let me know if there's any problem, thanks.[/b]
[color=#a2c4c9][b][font=Georgia][size=5]
[/size][/font][/b][/color][color=#a2c4c9][b][font=Georgia][size=5]Recommended Mods[/size][/font][/b][/color]

[b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?]Facelight[/url][/b] (like very highly recommended :p)
[color=#a4c2f4][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34346/?]Smile in HD[/url][/b][/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?][b]Amazing Follower Tweaks[/b][/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60868/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/IQL7Bgm.png[/img][/url][/center][color=#d5a6bd]  [/color][/b][color=#a2c4c9][b][font=Georgia][size=5]

Last words[/size][/font][/b][/color]

It was real fun to make my first follower and i hope you'll enjoy it. Feel free to comment, add screenshots, ask questions or even giving me constructive criticism.

Have fun in Skyrim, cya !

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61075/?]
[/url]
